page.title: 12DR. BORROW AND DENTAMILK
page.content: Doctor Borrow began to set up the Borrow Dental Milk Foundation in 1970. The offices and dairies are at Padnell Grange, Cowplain. In Hampshire Dentalmilk can be delivered to the doorstep. Dentamilk is milk with fluoride added. The idea is to reduce tooth decay. A Hungarian Dental Research team concluded that when children of three years upwards drink Dentamilk it is possible to reduce dental decay by 74%. The Louisiana State University awarded Dr. Borrow an Honorary Doctorate for his work in promoting Dentamilk. Two of the foundation's aims are to encourage the study and research in fluoridation of milk and to employ medical and dental specialists and other professionals and technical staff.
